title: Help with shop! :-O
body:
I have a problem with my shop, I get a message saying to restart client, and ive been getting this since last patch. All my friends say the shop works fine, but for me I cant buy rp, or champions!
I need help.

The only thing i dont try is reinstalling league, but its so big, it takes so long, idk.

Any solutions?!

Thanks!

replies.body:
The store relies on a number of security and Internet settings in order to function properly. We've consolidated the most common solutions for store issues in [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps resolved the issue.

WOW!
You were right. I figured maybe it was a glitch with my client? but i remember around the beginning of patch 6.18 i changed my internet security settings for less ads.
Woops, thank you so much, it helped.
